title: 7.1.4 Create AWS connection API endpoints
body:
## Parent Issue
#29 - 7.1 AWS Account Connection

## Objective
Create REST API endpoints for AWS connection management.

## Endpoints
- POST /api/v1/aws/connect/role
- POST /api/v1/aws/connect/keys
- GET /api/v1/aws/accounts
- GET /api/v1/aws/accounts/:id
- POST /api/v1/aws/accounts/:id/validate
- DELETE /api/v1/aws/accounts/:id
- GET /api/v1/aws/setup-instructions

## Files to Create
- `src/cloud_optimizer/api/routers/aws.py`
- `data/iam/policy.json`
- `data/iam/trust-policy.json`

## Estimated Time: 2.5 hours
